Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Prohibits any sex offender from residing within a quarter mile of any school, playground, park or building in which child day care is provided
Summary: Prohibits any sex offender from residing within a quarter mile of any school, playground, park or building in which child day care is provided.
LawCode: Amd §§168-b & 168-t, ren §168-w to be §168-x, add §168-w, Cor L; amd §259-c, Exec L; amd §65.10, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the executive law and the penal law, in relation to prohibiting sex offenders from living within a quarter mile of any school, park, playground or building in which child day care is provided
